prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that has a sleek metallic body and sharp claws.
Imagine a Pokemon with a red exoskeleton and impressive speed in battles.
Generate a character design for a fierce insectoid Pokemon with powerful pincers.
Show me a Pokemon that is a combination of steel and bug types, with unique features.
Make a visually appealing Pokemon that stands out with its shiny red color and wings.
Design a Pokemon that embodies agility and precision, featuring striking red and blue elements.
Give me a unique Pokemon concept with a blend of insect and steel elements.
